    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(ChangeMessage m)
        Description copied from interface: Observer
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls an Observable object's Observable.notify(ChangeMessage) method to have all the object's observers notified of the change.
        Parameters:
        m - an argument passed to the Observable.notify(ChangeMessage) method
